casebody.data:
James A. YURCHAK, Appellant-Petitioner,
v.
NEW JERSEY DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent-Respondent. C-262 September Term 2017
080038 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 26, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004140-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
